title: The Baby Clause 2.0
description: How does he handle the new addition to his life?The Baby Clause is a short continuation of Richard and Katyâ€™s story, containing humorous glimpses into his life as a father, and how his world has changed.A must-read for all fans of The Contract!Originally published as a brief chapter for charity to support the Keith Milano Fund . Readers asked for it back. Here it is with expanded content and in paperback.
author: Melanie Moreland
